name: Ken Goldberg
abstract: Kenneth Y. Goldberg is a Professor of Industrial Engineering and Operations Research, with a joint appointment in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, and in the School of Information at the University of California, Berkeley.
related_searches: Tiffany Shlain is Ken Goldberg's spouse.
related_books: When the Man You Love Won't Take Care of His Health
A 12-Week Plan for Bolstering Your Health, Boosting Your Brainpower, Getting Lean, Powering Up, and Adding Years to Your Life
